import React from 'react' import { isEmpty } from 'lodash' import './search-box.css' import PokeDexService from '../../service/pokedex.service' class SearchBox extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { pokemons: {} } } componentDidMount() { PokeDexService.getPokeInfo() .then((response) => { this.setState({ pokemon: response }) }) } render() { return (
{!isEmpty(this.state.pokemon) ?

) } } export default SearchBox
